title: Looking to create a Rank Team - Silver+
body:
Looking to create a rank team that is semi-serious. Silver plus, using skype. So just drop your IGN below and roles/pref-roles (good if you know more than one - so we can do rotatas if needed). 

Also: recommend a 'Team Name' 

Benefits: - play and learn from each other and get a mindset/practice for rank games
                - Grill gamers and false advertising awaits

Me: Gold 5, Frostwolf77 - any role but adc

replies.body:
Hey~ not sure if ur still recruiting but here I go~
IGN: vanilla42
G1 Supp pref (thresh, janna, lulu and sona pref but willing to learn new champion for team composition!), I guess I can play any role except jg...but  i'm a really passive player... 
I can skype and relatively free most of the time^^ 
I'm not a great "carrier" and pretty new to league but i'm really positive and can support team mentally even in bad situation!!  
Thanks

G5 JG/Mid pref
ign: Vitrolix
always keen to play

all over silver 
ign: pink blits
 really want to keep playing jg and bot pref
Bronze 1, supp/adc/jung and The Shia Leboufs ( I made a team for this name but if you want it add me and lemme know)
Gold 5, I can play any role.
